json_schema.name: iteration2
json_schema.description: Object representing an enriched note, including a concise summary, key insights, practical examples, mathematical formulas in Typst, and code snippets. Return the note enriched with additional information that provides a deeper understanding of the subject matter. Language: Spanish.

description.description: A concise summary that captures the essential content of the note.

key_points.description: A list of key insights and takeaways from the note.

practical_examples.description: Practical examples that illustrate the concepts in the note.

math_formulas.description: Mathematical formulas written in Typst format.

code_snippets.description: Code snippets that demonstrate technical concepts.
